description.zh-cn: 晚清时期湘军将领，新疆建省后首任巡抚。曾参与平定太平天国、陕甘回变，并随左宗棠收复新疆。
description.en: A general of the Xiang Army in the late Qing Dynasty, and the first governor of Xinjiang after its establishment as a province. He participated in suppressing the Taiping Rebellion and the Dungan Revolt, and recovered Xinjiang with Zuo Zongtang.

description.zh-cn: 湘军将领，刘锦棠的叔父，在金积战役中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Xiang Army, uncle of Liu Jintang, who was killed in the Battle of Jinji.

description.zh-cn: 湘军军官，刘锦棠的父亲，在岳州被太平军杀害。
description.en: An officer of the Xiang Army, father of Liu Jintang, who was killed by the Taiping army in Yuezhou.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，洋务运动的代表人物之一，率军收复新疆。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing Dynasty, a key figure in the Self-Strengthening Movement, who led the army to recover Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，湘军的创立者和统帅。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing Dynasty, founder and commander of the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 晚清八旗将领，与刘锦棠一同参与收复新疆之战。
description.en: A Manchu general of the late Qing Dynasty who participated in the recovery of Xinjiang alongside Liu Jintang.

description.zh-cn: 晚清大臣，因签订《伊犁条约》引发争议。
description.en: A minister of the late Qing Dynasty who caused controversy by signing the Treaty of Livadia.

description.zh-cn: 晚清外交家，曾国藩之子，负责与俄国重新谈判伊犁问题。
description.en: A diplomat of the late Qing Dynasty, son of Zeng Guofan, who was responsible for renegotiating the Ili issue with Russia.

description.zh-cn: 陕甘回变领袖之一，后投降被刘锦棠处死。
description.en: A leader of the Dungan Revolt, who surrendered and was later executed by Liu Jintang.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由曾国藩组建的以湖南人为主的地方武装。
description.en: A regional army organized by Zeng Guofan in the late Qing Dynasty, composed mainly of people from Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由洪秀全建立的农民起义政权。
description.en: A rebel state during the late Qing Dynasty established by Hong Xiuquan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期活跃于中国北方的一支农民起义武装。
description.en: A peasant rebel army active in northern China during the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在新疆建省后设立的最高地方行政长官职位。
description.en: The highest local administrative post established by the Qing Dynasty after Xinjiang became a province.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，为辅导太子的“三师”之一。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official title, one of the 'Three Tutors' responsible for advising the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 清朝的一种贵族爵位。
description.en: A title of nobility in the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝中央机构兵部的副长官。
description.en: The deputy head of the Ministry of War in the central government of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在新疆地区设立的最高军政长官。
description.en: The highest military and administrative official stationed in the Xinjiang region by the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝同治年间在中国西北地区爆发的一场大规模回民动乱。
description.en: A large-scale rebellion by the Hui people in Northwestern China during the Tongzhi era of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年由左宗棠率领，旨在收复被阿古柏侵占的新疆地区的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign in the late Qing Dynasty led by Zuo Zongtang to recover Xinjiang from the occupation of Yaqub Beg.

description.zh-cn: 清军平定陕甘回变期间的一场重要战役，刘松山在此战中阵亡。
description.en: A major battle during the Qing suppression of the Dungan Revolt, in which Liu Songshan was killed.

description.zh-cn: 清朝钦差大臣崇厚与俄罗斯帝国签订的关于交还伊犁地区的条约，因损害中国权益而未被批准。
description.en: A treaty signed between the Qing envoy Chonghou and the Russian Empire regarding the return of the Ili region, which was not ratified due to its infringement on Chinese interests.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个帝制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 1721年至1917年间存在的帝国，与清朝就伊犁问题进行交涉。
description.en: An empire that existed from 1721 to 1917, which negotiated with the Qing Dynasty over the Ili issue.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省的县级行政区，是刘锦棠的出生地和逝世地。
description.en: A county-level administrative region in Hunan Province, China, the birthplace and death place of Liu Jintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国新疆维吾尔自治区的首府，在收复新疆之战中被刘锦棠率军攻克。
description.en: The capital of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region in China, captured by forces led by Liu Jintang during the recovery of Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 刘厚荣是刘锦棠的父亲。
description.en: Liu Hourong was Liu Jintang's father.

description.zh-cn: 刘松山是刘锦棠的叔父。
description.en: Liu Songshan was Liu Jintang's uncle.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠早年投效叔父刘松山所在的湘军部队。
description.en: In his early years, Liu Jintang joined the Xiang Army unit where his uncle Liu Songshan served.

description.zh-cn: 1884年新疆建省后，刘锦棠担任第一任甘肃新疆巡抚。
description.en: After Xinjiang was established as a province in 1884, Liu Jintang served as the first Governor of Gansu-Xinjiang.

position.en: Grand Tutor of the Crown Prince

description.zh-cn: 在收复新疆之战中，刘锦棠作为左宗棠麾下的主力先锋将领。
description.en: During the war to recover Xinjiang, Liu Jintang served as a main vanguard general under Zuo Zongtang's command.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠参与了平定太平天国的军事行动。
description.en: Liu Jintang participated in the military actions to suppress the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠在平定太平天国后，继续参与剿灭捻军的军事行动。
description.en: After suppressing the Taiping Rebellion, Liu Jintang continued to participate in military actions to eliminate the Nian Army.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠曾参与平息陕甘回变。
description.en: Liu Jintang participated in suppressing the Dungan Revolt.

description.zh-cn: 在马化龙投降后，刘锦棠将其全家依律凌迟处死。
description.en: After Ma Hualong's surrender, Liu Jintang executed him and his entire family by lingchi according to the law.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠作为先锋主力参与了收复新疆之战，并率军攻克乌鲁木齐。
description.en: As a main vanguard force, Liu Jintang participated in the war to recover Xinjiang and led his troops to capture Ürümqi.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠率领湘军主力一举夺回了乌鲁木齐。
description.en: Liu Jintang led the main force of the Xiang Army to recapture Ürümqi.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦棠的父亲刘厚荣在岳州被太平军杀害。
description.en: Liu Jintang's father, Liu Hourong, was killed by the Taiping army in Yuezhou.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩赏识刘锦棠及其叔父刘松山。
description.en: Zeng Guofan appreciated Liu Jintang and his uncle Liu Songshan.

description.zh-cn: 左宗棠统帅清军发起了收复新疆之战。
description.en: Zuo Zongtang commanded the Qing forces to launch the war to recover Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 金顺作为先锋主力与刘锦棠一同参与收复新疆之战。
description.en: As a main vanguard force, Jin Shun participated in the war to recover Xinjiang alongside Liu Jintang.

description.zh-cn: 崇厚作为清朝钦差大臣与俄国签订了《伊犁条约》。
description.en: As the Qing imperial commissioner, Chonghou signed the Treaty of Livadia with Russia.

description.zh-cn: 清朝朝廷对《伊犁条约》的内容表示不满，未予批准，并另派曾纪泽重新谈判。
description.en: The Qing court expressed dissatisfaction with the content of the Treaty of Livadia, refused to ratify it, and dispatched Zeng Jize to renegotiate.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪泽是曾国藩的儿子。
description.en: Zeng Jize was the son of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 奉命与俄国重新谈判，以争取更好的条约条件，从而阻止了原《伊犁条约》的生效。
description.en: He was ordered to renegotiate with Russia to secure better terms, thereby preventing the original Treaty of Livadia from taking effect.

description.zh-cn: 刘松山在金积战役中阵亡。
description.en: Liu Songshan was killed in the Battle of Jinji.

description.zh-cn: 刘松山在金积战役中被马化龙所部的回将诈降所害而阵亡。
description.en: Liu Songshan was killed in the Battle of Jinji after being deceived by a feigned surrender from generals under Ma Hualong's command.
